cards.rules_text:
Whenever Cristichi is dealt damage or you roll one or more dice, create a 4/3 red Fire Incarnate dragon creature token with reach and “When this creature deals damage, sacrifice it.”
Choose a background [i](You can have a Background as a second commander.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I didn't ask who is in the room, I said I CAST FIREBALL.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Commander creatures you own have
“{1}{G}, {T}: Each player rolls a d20.
[b]1-9 |[/b] Investigate.
[b]10-19 [/b]| Draw a card.
[b]20 [/b]| Draw two cards.”
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Let me tell you the story of how I discovered I resist fire. You see, I happen to be crazy, but creative.”
— Cristichi[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
When this creature deals damage, sacrifice it.
Commander creatures you own have “Whenever you cast a sorcery spell, roll a d6. If the result is 6, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. Otherwise, you lose 1 life.”
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You can draw power from the deepest parts of your mind, if only you break it in half.”[/i]
